metadata.synopsis: While following the caravan, together with the players are ambushed by a group of players. If they side with the drider after the combat resolves it will thank them.

42.speaker: Kar'niss
42.text: And what of the strange little turncoat, Majesty? Should we spare them?

13.speaker: Narrator
13.text: *Your minds connect and you hear a whispered voice. The Absolute? Or just the echoes of his fractured mind, reverberating in the dark?*

12.speaker: Kar'niss
12.text: A True Soul. Why would one of our queen's blessed walk with Harpers?

14.speaker: Kar'niss
14.text: They are holier than me - a greater part of Her design! I was wrong to question them!
14.context: CinematicNodeContext: detect thoughts node - this is the creature's thoughts rather than direct speechNodeContext: detect thoughts node - this is the creature's thoughts rather than direct speech

58.speaker: Kar'niss
58.text: So many voices inside my mind, so many - but these ones are tricksters and thieves!
58.context: NodeContext: angry and confused - somebody just tried to steal thougths from your mind

2.speaker: Player
2.text: Do not question your superiors, creature. My orders come directly from the Absolute.

57.speaker: Kar'niss
57.text: Yes, yes, of course. Her grace burns bright in them - I see it!

39.speaker: Player
39.text: I infiltrated their ranks - gathering information for our cause.

17.speaker: Kar'niss
17.text: Very well. We welcome all who follow our holy queen.

54.speaker: Kar'niss
54.text: Are they ready to depart? We do not want to linger in the shadows, Majesty.

61.speaker: Kar'niss
61.text: Follow close - the shadows are hungry. Do not stray from the light.

20.speaker: Player
20.text: Give me a moment, I'm not ready to go yet.

68.speaker: Kar'niss
68.text: We will wait, but not for long.

36.speaker: Kar'niss
36.text: They think us fools, Majesty. They think we don't see through their lies!

66.speaker: Player
66.text: I answer to the Absolute, not to you.

24.speaker: Player
24.text: Don't you dare speak to me, you abomination!

59.speaker: Kar'niss
59.text: Very well. We depart when you are ready.

74.speaker: Player
74.text: You'll wait here. I'll tell you when I'm ready.

81.speaker: Kar'niss
81.text: How dare they - we are all equal in our queen's crusade. To say otherwise is heresy!

56.speaker: Kar'niss
56.text: Wretched little things. No better than the shadows.

38.speaker: Kar'niss
38.text: But no matter, Majesty. They are already dead, and soon forgotten.

28.speaker: Kar'niss
28.text: Perhaps they wish to stop our Queen's great mission. But we are not concerned.

22.speaker: Kar'niss
22.text: You will wipe away all opposition, Majesty. Nothing can stand in the way of Your glory.

48.speaker: Kar'niss
48.text: The sooner we reach Moonrise, the sooner you will see Her power.

37.speaker: Player
37.text: Examine one of the bodies, looking for the magic protecting them out here.

19.speaker: Player
19.text: You feel a familiar power from the bodies. Try to find its source.

86.speaker: Narrator
86.text: *You notice something odd on the fallen soldier - a faint glow about the face, like an aura fast-fading.*

80.speaker: Narrator
80.text: *You can feel the power it held - weak, but still divine. These soldiers were protected from the shadows by a blessing of Selûne.*

63.speaker: Narrator
63.text: *You can feel the power it held - weak, but still divine. These soldiers were protected from the shadows by your own lady Selûne.*

78.speaker: Kar'niss
78.text: All dead, majesty. It is time for us to move on.

0.speaker: Player
0.text: They're protected from the curse by a power like your lantern - but weaker.

4.speaker: Kar'niss
4.text: Because their gods are weaker. None compare to the Absolute.

31.speaker: Player
31.text: I need a moment to look around.

16.speaker: Kar'niss
16.text: They will hurry, Majesty. They must not keep you waiting.

72.speaker: Kar'niss
72.text: Come, follow us to Moonrise Towers. Then you will see Her power in all its glory.

53.speaker: Kar'niss
53.text: Follow close. We shall lead them home, Majesty.

75.speaker: Narrator
75.text: *You can feel the power it held - weak, but still divine. These soldiers were protected from Your Lady's shadows by her wretched sister Selûne.*

33.speaker: Narrator
33.text: *Aside from the wounds of battle, you can't see anything unusual.*

40.speaker: Player
40.text: You feel a familiar power from the bodies. Try to find its source.

84.speaker: Player
84.text: Give me a moment. I want to look around.

18.speaker: Player
18.text: It was a pleasure to kill by your side. Onwards, in death!

11.speaker: Kar'niss
11.text: Yes, we have our duty. We shall lead them home, Majesty.

77.speaker: Player
77.text: Let's go. We need to reach Moonrise.

3.speaker: Player
3.text: You never said there were others out here. Who are they?

73.speaker: Kar'niss
73.text: Harpers. Spies. Little scurrying rats, trying to stop our queen's great mission.

25.speaker: Kar'niss
25.text: But they will fail. They cannot hope to stand in our way, Majesty.

76.speaker: Kar'niss
76.text: They must get on. They must hurry.

52.speaker: Player
52.text: 'They' just need another moment. I won't be long.

65.speaker: Kar'niss
65.text: Do not linger. Must not linger.

21.speaker: Player
21.text: To Moonrise, then - lead the way.

82.speaker: Kar'niss
82.text: Are they ready, Majesty? Can we leave?
